img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 5.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7a/Wukong_UpperHollow_5.jpg)
Head up the stone stairs back up the slope to find more houses and a green Wisp behind one, with a Lantern Holder out front. Here's a series of stairs leading even higher up from here, leading to a large walled gate.
img_below_text:
As you head through the gate, look on the other side for a small **Turtle Chest** , and inside you'll find a **Goji Shoots Soak** for your Gourd!
![Wukong UpperHollow 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/20/Wukong_UpperHollow_7.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 7 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 5.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7a/Wukong_UpperHollow_5.jpg)
Head up the stone stairs back up the slope to find more houses and a green Wisp behind one, with a Lantern Holder out front. Here's a series of stairs leading even higher up from here, leading to a large walled gate."
            - Following Text: "As you head through the gate, look on the other side for a small **Turtle Chest** , and inside you'll find a **Goji Shoots Soak** for your Gourd!
![Wukong UpperHollow 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/20/Wukong_UpperHollow_7.jpg)"

            Your task:

            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist stands near a Turtle Chest, which is located just beyond a large walled gate. The Turtle Chest contains a Goji Shoots Soak for the player's Gourd, which is a collectible item in the game. This image serves to illustrate the location and appearance of the Turtle Chest as part of the walkthrough guide for the Upper Hollow area.
